select staff_id , staff_pass , staff_name , staff_pnum , staff_email , memo , active_yn , admin_yn , to_char(cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_dt , cret_id , to_char(updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , updt_id , to_char(lateass_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as lateass_dt from web.staff where 1=1
AND
staff_name LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
staff_id LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
staff_email LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
staff_name LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or staff_id LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or staff_email LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
order by cret_dt

select staff_id , staff_pass , staff_name , staff_pnum , staff_email , memo , active_yn , admin_yn , to_char(cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_dt , cret_id , to_char(updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , updt_id , to_char(lateass_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as lateass_dt from web.staff where 1=1 and staff_id = #{staffId}

AND
BAS.AREA_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
BAS.CLIENT_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
BAS.BLDG_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
BAS.AREA_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or BAS.CLIENT_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or BAS.BLDG_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
order by BAS.CRET_DT

AND
BAS.AREA_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
BAS.CLIENT_NM LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'

insert into web.bldg_dtl (bldg_cd, dong_num, active_yn, dong_qr_url, cret_dt, cret_id, updt_dt, updt_id, clean_cnt, from_dt, to_dt) values (#{bldgCd}, #{dongNum},#{activeYn}, #{dongQrUrl}, now(), #{cretId}, now(), #{updtId}, #{cleanCnt}, #{fromDt}, #{toDt})
